content: I think I'll start by researching my competition and calculating my costs to determine a base price for each product. Then, I'll consider tiering my pricing to offer different options for customers. I like the idea of offering bundles or promotions to incentivize customers to buy more. For my new scents and colors, I might offer a "Limited Edition" bundle that includes a few of the new products at a discounted price. This could create a sense of urgency and encourage customers to buy sooner rather than later.
